attributes.additional_details: It's now time to end the BBC licence fee as it was unfair for the BBC to to have an opinion or to take sides during the referendum. The BBC has consistently Show it's favouritism for the remain side before, during and even after the referendum. We the undersigned believe it is unfair to be paying for a TV licence to the BBC that has own opinions and influence other people's decisions and we now demand that the licence fee be dropped.
attributes.background: The BBC licence fee is paid by all households in the United Kingdom and should not express any opinions and should be neutral with matters that concern the British public.
